verses.verse: מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> The burden מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Behold the LORD רֹכֵ֨ב <S%H7392><s%> rideth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עָ֥ב <S%H5645><s%> cloud קַל֙ <S%H7031><s%> upon a swift וּבָ֣א <S%H935><s%> and shall come מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וְנָע֞וּ <S%H5128><s%> shall be moved אֱלִילֵ֤י <S%H457><s%> and the idols מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מִפָּנָ֔יו <S%H6440><s%> at his presence וּלְבַ֥ב <S%H3824><s%> and the heart מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt יִמַּ֥ס <S%H4549><s%> shall melt בְּקִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst

וְסִכְסַכְתִּ֤י <S%H5526><s%> And I will set מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> the Egyptians בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> against the Egyptians וְנִלְחֲמ֥וּ <S%H3898><s%> and they shall fight אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> every one בְּאָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> against his brother וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and every one בְּרֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> against his neighbour עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city בְּעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> against city מַמְלָכָ֖ה <S%H4467><s%> [and] kingdom בְּמַמְלָכָֽה׃ <S%H4467><s%> against kingdom

וְנָבְקָ֤ה <S%H1238><s%> shall fail רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7307><s%> And the spirit מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt בְּקִרְבּ֔וֹ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst וַעֲצָת֖וֹ <S%H6098><s%> the counsel אֲבַלֵּ֑עַ <S%H1104><s%> thereof and I will destroy וְדָרְשׁ֤וּ <S%H1875><s%> thereof and they shall seek אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָֽאֱלִילִים֙ <S%H457><s%> to the idols וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הָ֣אִטִּ֔ים <S%H328><s%> and to the charmers וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הָאֹב֖וֹת <S%H178><s%> and to them that have familiar spirits וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to הַיִּדְּעֹנִֽים׃ <S%H3049><s%> and to the wizards

וְסִכַּרְתִּי֙ <S%H5534><s%> will I give over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> And מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> the Egyptians בְּיַ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> into the hand אֲדֹנִ֣ים <S%H113><s%> lord קָשֶׁ֑ה <S%H7186><s%> of a cruel וּמֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king עַז֙ <S%H5794><s%> and a fierce יִמְשָׁל־ <S%H4910><s%> shall rule בָּ֔ם נְאֻ֥ם <S%H5002><s%> over them saith הָאָד֖וֹן <S%H113><s%> the Lord יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts

וְנִשְּׁתוּ־ <S%H3001><s%> and dried up מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> And the waters מֵֽהַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> from the sea וְנָהָ֖ר <S%H5104><s%> and the river יֶחֱרַ֥ב <S%H2717><s%> shall be wasted וְיָבֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H5405><s%> shall fail

וְהֶאֶזְנִ֣יחוּ <S%H2186><s%> far away נְהָר֔וֹת <S%H5104><s%> the rivers דָּלֲל֥וּ <S%H1809><s%> shall be emptied וְחָרְב֖וּ <S%H2717><s%> and dried up יְאֹרֵ֣י <S%H2975><s%> [and] the brooks מָצ֑וֹר <S%H4693><s%> of defence קָנֶ֥ה <S%H7070><s%> the reeds וָס֖וּף <S%H5488><s%> and flags קָמֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H7060><s%> shall wither

עָר֥וֹת <S%H6169><s%> The paper reeds עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by יְא֖וֹר <S%H2975><s%> by the brooks עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> by the mouth יְא֑וֹר <S%H2975><s%> of the brooks וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> and all מִזְרַ֣ע <S%H4218><s%> and every thing sown יְא֔וֹר <S%H2975><s%> by the brooks יִיבַ֥שׁ <S%H3001><s%> shall wither נִדַּ֖ף <S%H5086><s%> be driven away וְאֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H369><s%> and be no

וְאָנוּ֙ <S%H578><s%> also shall mourn הַדַּיָּגִ֔ים <S%H1771><s%> The fishers וְאָ֣בְל֔וּ <S%H56><s%> shall lament כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַשְׁלִיכֵ֥י <S%H7993><s%> and all they that cast בַיְא֖וֹר <S%H2975><s%> into the brooks חַכָּ֑ה <S%H2443><s%> angle וּפֹרְשֵׂ֥י <S%H6566><s%> and they that spread מִכְמֹ֛רֶת <S%H4365><s%> nets עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> up פְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> upon מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> the waters אֻמְלָֽלוּ׃ <S%H535><s%> shall languish

וּבֹ֛שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> shall be confounded עֹבְדֵ֥י <S%H5647><s%> Moreover they that work פִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6593><s%> flax שְׂרִיק֑וֹת <S%H8305><s%> in fine וְאֹרְגִ֖ים <S%H707><s%> and they that weave חוֹרָֽי׃ <S%H2355><s%> networks

וְהָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become שָׁתֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H8356><s%> in the purposes מְדֻכָּאִ֑ים <S%H1792><s%> And they shall be broken כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עֹ֥שֵׂי <S%H6213><s%> thereof all that make שֶׂ֖כֶר <S%H7938><s%> sluices אַגְמֵי־ <S%H99><s%> [and] ponds נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> for fish

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> are mere אֱוִלִים֙ <S%H196><s%> foolish שָׂ֣רֵי <S%H8269><s%> Surely the princes צֹ֔עַן <S%H6814><s%> of Zoan חַכְמֵי֙ <S%H2450><s%> of the wise יֹעֲצֵ֣י <S%H6098><s%> the counsel פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> of Pharaoh עֵצָ֖ה <S%H6098><s%> the advice נִבְעָרָ֑ה <S%H1197><s%> is become brutish אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> How תֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> how say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> ye unto Pharaoh בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> I [am] the son חֲכָמִ֥ים <S%H2450><s%> of the wise אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַלְכֵי־ <S%H4428><s%> king קֶֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> of ancient

אַיָּם֙ <S%H335><s%> Where אֵפ֣וֹא <S%H645><s%> [are] they? where חֲכָמֶ֔יךָ <S%H2450><s%> [are] thy wise וְיַגִּ֥ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> [men]? and let them tell נָ֖א <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee לָ֑ךְ וְיֵ֣דְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> thee now and let them know מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what יָּעַ֛ץ <S%H3289><s%> hath purposed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> upon Egypt

נֽוֹאֲלוּ֙ <S%H2973><s%> are become fools שָׂ֣רֵי <S%H8269><s%> The princes צֹ֔עַן <S%H6814><s%> of Zoan נִשְּׁא֖וּ <S%H5377><s%> are deceived שָׂ֣רֵי <S%H8269><s%> the princes נֹ֑ף <S%H5297><s%> of Noph הִתְע֥וּ <S%H8582><s%> they have also seduced אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> Egypt פִּנַּ֥ת <S%H6438><s%> [even they that are] the stay שְׁבָטֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H7626><s%> of the tribes

יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD מָסַ֥ךְ <S%H4537><s%> hath mingled בְּקִרְבָּ֖הּ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit עִוְעִ֑ים <S%H5773><s%> a perverse וְהִתְע֤וּ <S%H8582><s%> to err אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> thereof and they have caused Egypt בְּכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲשֵׂ֔הוּ <S%H4639><s%> in every work כְּהִתָּע֥וֹת <S%H8582><s%> [man] staggereth שִׁכּ֖וֹר <S%H7910><s%> thereof as a drunken בְּקִיאֽוֹ׃ <S%H6892><s%> in his vomit

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will be no יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> for Egypt מַֽעֲשֶׂ֑ה <S%H4639><s%> Neither shall there be [any] work אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> Which יַעֲשֶׂ֛ה <S%H6213><s%> may do רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> which the head וְזָנָ֖ב <S%H2180><s%> or tail כִּפָּ֥ה <S%H3712><s%> branch וְאַגְמֽוֹן׃ <S%H100><s%> or rush ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִֽהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will become מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> shall Egypt כַּנָּשִׁ֑ים <S%H802><s%> be like unto women וְחָרַ֣ד ׀ <S%H2729><s%> and it shall be afraid וּפָחַ֗ד <S%H6342><s%> and fear מִפְּנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> because תְּנוּפַת֙ <S%H8573><s%> of the shaking יַד־ <S%H3027><s%> of the hand יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מֵנִ֥יף <S%H5130><s%> which he shaketh עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> over

וְ֠הָיְתָה <S%H1961><s%> will become אַדְמַ֨ת <S%H127><s%> And the land יְהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לְמִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> unto Egypt לְחָגָּ֔א <S%H2283><s%> shall be a terror כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> everyone אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> to whom יַזְכִּ֥יר <S%H2142><s%> every one that maketh mention אֹתָ֛הּ <S%H853><s%> אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> will be in יִפְחָ֑ד <S%H6342><s%> thereof shall be afraid מִפְּנֵ֗י <S%H6440><s%> in himself because עֲצַת֙ <S%H6098><s%> of the counsel יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יוֹעֵ֥ץ <S%H3289><s%> which he hath determined עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> against ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֡וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִהְיוּ֩ <S%H1961><s%> become חָמֵ֨שׁ <S%H2568><s%> shall five עָרִ֜ים <S%H5892><s%> cities בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מְדַבְּרוֹת֙ <S%H1696><s%> speak שְׂפַ֣ת <S%H8193><s%> the language כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וְנִשְׁבָּע֖וֹת <S%H7650><s%> and swear לַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> The city הַהֶ֔רֶס <S%H2041><s%> of destruction יֵאָמֵ֖ר <S%H559><s%> shall be called לְאֶחָֽת׃ <S%H259><s%> one ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִֽהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become מִזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> shall there be an altar לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> to the LORD בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וּמַצֵּבָ֥ה <S%H4676><s%> and a pillar אֵֽצֶל־ <S%H681><s%> at גְּבוּלָ֖הּ <S%H1366><s%> the border לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> thereof to the LORD

וְהָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> will become לְא֥וֹת <S%H226><s%> And it shall be for a sign וּלְעֵ֛ד <S%H5707><s%> and for a witness לַֽיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יִצְעֲק֤וּ <S%H6817><s%> for they shall cry אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> because לֹֽחֲצִ֔ים <S%H3905><s%> of the oppressors וְיִשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> and he shall send לָהֶ֛ם מוֹשִׁ֥יעַ <S%H3467><s%> them a saviour וָרָ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> and a great one וְהִצִּילָֽם׃ <S%H5337><s%> and he shall deliver

וְנוֹדַ֤ע <S%H3045><s%> shall be known יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לְמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> to Egypt וְיָדְע֥וּ <S%H3045><s%> shall know מִצְרַ֛יִם <S%H4714><s%> and the Egyptians אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְעָֽבְדוּ֙ <S%H5647><s%> and shall do זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> sacrifice וּמִנְחָ֔ה <S%H4503><s%> and oblation וְנָדְרוּ־ <S%H5087><s%> yea they shall vow נֵ֥דֶר <S%H5088><s%> a vow לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וְשִׁלֵּֽמוּ׃ <S%H7999><s%> and perform

וְנָגַ֧ף <S%H5062><s%> shall smite יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> Egypt נָגֹ֣ף <S%H5062><s%> he shall smite וְרָפ֑וֹא <S%H7495><s%> and heal וְשָׁ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> [it] and they shall return עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> [even] to the LORD וְנֶעְתַּ֥ר <S%H6279><s%> and he shall be intreated לָהֶ֖ם וּרְפָאָֽם׃ <S%H7495><s%> of them and shall heal

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he תִּהְיֶ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> will be a מְסִלָּ֤ה <S%H4546><s%> shall there be a highway מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt אַשּׁ֔וּרָה <S%H804><s%> to Assyria וּבָֽא־ <S%H935><s%> shall come אַשּׁ֥וּר <S%H804><s%> and the Assyrian בְּמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> into Egypt וּמִצְרַ֣יִם <S%H4714><s%> and the Egyptian בְּאַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> into Assyria וְעָבְד֥וּ <S%H5647><s%> shall serve מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> and the Egyptians אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַשּֽׁוּר׃ <S%H804><s%> with the Assyrians ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִהְיֶ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> become יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> shall Israel שְׁלִ֣ישִׁיָּ֔ה <S%H7992><s%> be the third לְמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> with Egypt וּלְאַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> and with Assyria בְּרָכָ֖ה <S%H1293><s%> [even] a blessing בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> of the land

אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> whom בֵּרֲכ֛וֹ <S%H1288><s%> shall bless יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Whom the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying בָּר֨וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed עַמִּ֜י <S%H5971><s%> my people מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> [be] Egypt וּמַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יָדַי֙ <S%H3027><s%> of my hands אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> and Assyria וְנַחֲלָתִ֖י <S%H5159><s%> mine inheritance יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> and Israel ס
